data.name: Madeline Hotel & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection
data.hotelDescription:
Spa and Ski-in/Ski-out Access
Indulge in massages and facials at the onsite spa, then enjoy the convenience of ski-in/ski-out access for a seamless slope experience.

Fine Dining and Amenities
Treat yourself to local cuisine at M Lounge or opt for 24-hour room service. Take a dip in the outdoor pool, hit the fitness center, and enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi and concierge services.

Luxurious Accommodations
Relax in air-conditioned rooms with premium bedding and deep soaking bathtubs. Stay entertained with DVD players and LCD TVs, while staying connected with complimentary wireless internet access.

Book now to experience luxury and convenience at Madeline Hotel & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection, near Telluride's top attractions.
data.hotelImportantInformation:
* Reservations are required for massage services and spa treatments. Reservations can be made by contacting the hotel prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation.
* Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms.
* The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.
* Guests can arrange to bring pets by contacting the property directly, using the contact information on the booking confirmation (surcharges apply and can be found in the Fees section).
* A car is not required for transportation to and from this property.
* Parking height restrictions apply.
* Contactless check-in and contactless check-out are available.

1 King Bed

Internet - Free WiFi

Entertainment - LCD television, satellite channels, and DVD player

Food & Drink - Coffee/tea maker, 24-hour room service, and free bottled water

25/12/2024

cons: Mixed opinions on value for money

categories.name: Cleanliness
categories.description: Guests mentioned cleanliness as a positive aspect, but some reviews noted minor cleanliness issues.

categories.name: Service
categories.description: Service was a highlight with many guests praising the staff's friendliness and responsiveness.

categories.name: Location
categories.description: The hotel's location was highly appreciated for its proximity to key landmarks and easy access to public transport.

categories.name: Room Quality
categories.description: Guests found the rooms spacious and comfortable, although some mentioned minor maintenance issues.

categories.name: Amenities
categories.description: Guests were satisfied with the provided amenities, particularly the gym and pool, though some wished for additional services like a spa.

categories.name: Value for Money
categories.description: Opinions on value for money were mixed, with some guests feeling the price was high for the services offered.

categories.name: Food and Beverage
categories.description: The breakfast and restaurant services received positive feedback, though some guests desired more variety in the offerings.

categories.name: Overall Experience
categories.description: Most guests had a positive overall experience and would recommend the hotel to others.
